name: Puluong homestay1holiday
address: Số 2 bản lác cổ lũng bá Thước Thanh Hóa Số 2 bản lác bá Thước Thanh Hóa, Pu Luong, Việt Nam
description:
Puluong homestay1holiday có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, nhà hàng và quầy bar ở Pu Luong. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng kiểu lục địa, kiểu Mỹ hoặc kiểu Á mỗi buổi sáng.

Khách tại khách sạn sẽ có thể tận hưởng các hoạt động ở trong Pu Luong và khu vực xung quanh, như đi xe đạp.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Thọ Xuân, cách Puluong homestay1holiday 89 km.

review.comment_positive: Chủ homstay rất là thân thiện , tốt tính
review.comment_negative: Không có

review.rating: Rất thoải mái và đáng nhớ.
review.comment_positive: Anh chủ Homestay và chị nhân viên ở đây rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, luôn giúp đỡ mình trong chuyến đi này, và nấu cho chúng tôi những bữa ăn thật ngon.
review.comment_negative: Nước trong nhà vệ sinh hơi yếu, tuy nhiên vẫn chấp nhận được.

review.rating: Qúa tuyệt vời và hài lòng
review.comment_positive: Tuyệt vời

review.comment_negative: Phòng bẩn, ga giường, gối bẩn, nước yếu

review.room_type: Phòng 4 Người Có Phòng Tắm Riêng
review.comment_positive: Beautiful rural location. Delicious food with everyone eating together. Able to do some local walks and hire scooters.

Everything 
Lovely place run by wonderful host
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: I loved it here. Beautiful setting. Owner so very accommodating, generous and understanding. Always smiling. A darling-a
review.room_type: Phòng 4 Người Có Phòng Tắm Riêng
review.comment_positive: Beautiful homestay with pool views.
review.comment_negative:
Needs a woman’s touch for cleanliness. Needs a 1 meter bench top so that women can clean dishes and preserve their backs!! Currrently washing up bowl is on the ground. 
Pool tiles are very slippery when wet. Pool looked cloudy but was told it was a lack of recent rains. 
Plumbing to bathroom was a problem mostly overnight with no water available at all. Usually rectified by 0600.

review.comment_positive: Everything. Authentic experience. The owner of the place is so nice, helpful and makes great food.
review.comment_negative: The roosters like to party at night

review.comment_positive: Ta is very friendly and has great hospitality. The area is deeper in the nature reserve. We just walked from the home stay to trek. The rooms big and have a great balcony
review.comment_negative: The rooms, are a bit dirty and moldy. The shower water pressure is very week. Also, they assume you prefer a more western breakfast (rice pancake) instead of the traditional Pho. So let them know beforehand.

review.rating: Looking to avoid the tourist traps? Search no more!
review.comment_positive:
This is as local as you can get. A joy to enjoy the area before it gets touristy
Rooms: all of them made of bamboo except the 2 recently built which are made of bricks. Great pillows.
Food: Breakfast option could be noodles or coffee with pancake+banana+ honey (I’ve stayed in the 2 homestays on top of the waterfall and they offer the same). At night either you can join the family dinner or order something else (Ive seen spring rolls, omelette and mi xao bo). If they have other options I’m not sure, just ask. If you’re looking for something else (Pho) go to Pho Doan, near the market (4km). Pharmacies are located around there as well.
Getting Around: The home stay offers scooters and bikes (proper mtb). Follow the roads until the end of LANG CA and LUNG CAO. There are a number of small villages that look like taken from a fairy tale.
Convenience stores: Not far, in case you’re looking for toiletries, cookies, yogurt, fruits.
Trekking: There are a couple of trails / paths just in front of the property. The dogs living there might join you.
Facilities: Gorgeous swimming pool and a terrace/deck next to the pool is on the way (should be finish by late march)
Sleeping: Feels you’re listening to a white noise podcast. Just nature sounds and the stream flowing gentle across the street. Can’t beat that.
Big shout out to TA (the boss), always smiling, willing to help and give local tips. Any issues while staying there? Just speak to Ta and he will get it sorted out.
review.comment_negative: Nothing
